website_summaries.verdict: This toddler-friendly teeter-totter showcases a fun design as well as curved seats for safety.
pros: Curved and textured seats help keep young children in place when rocking, preventing falls
2 built-in handles allow for safe riding
Child can rock in the middle without a partner
cons: Quality feels a little cheap to many users
Handles are uncomfortable to hold for some

customer_reviews.title: Don’t sell me or others harmful or dangerous toys
customer_reviews.text: No where in the description did this indicate the product is made from chemicals that cause cancer! This is a toy for children!!! I’m outraged
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Buckner

customer_reviews.title: It's lasted 5 years in the sun
customer_reviews.text: We call it the rockin' gator! It's lasted 5 years and 4 kids outside in the sun 24/7. Highly recommend for longevity and fun appeal to the 5 and under crowd. We sawed off the feet on both ends which aids in drainage and allows the rocker to rock fully without a sudden stop. All of my kids play on this thing and have for 5 years. They're 7, 6, 4, and 2 years old now. One of the best toy purchases we've made!
customer_reviews.author: M.S.

customer_reviews.title: A single child can rock themselves by using the middle seat!
customer_reviews.text: It's awesome! So at first I was a little concerned that he wouldn't be able to use this without another child around as my other children are school-aged but it turns out that there is a middle seat and he can rock himself in the middle seat like a rocking horse or in this case a rocking alligator. Also my other two children can sit on either end and all three of them can use it at the same time. The other really great feature is that it's open and hollow so it won't fill the inside with water if you leave it out!
customer_reviews.author: Pepper

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun for kiddos! But handles should be rounded for comfort
customer_reviews.text: My 18mo and 3yr olds love this! I especially like that one person can enjoy it by themself as sometimes my 3 year old doesn’t want to play, the 1 year old can still enjoy it. The one con I have is that the handle cuts into their hands as it is a straight edge. My 3 year old complained that the handles hurt her hands. Perhaps rounding out the handles would help... that would make this a 5 star product.
customer_reviews.author: Deana

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for young toddlers
customer_reviews.text: Arrived today, and instantly became a hit! 3 yr old daughter is OBSESSED with see saws, and I didn’t want to invest in the bigger ones just yet.... her little sister is 16 months and obviously weighs less. Younger daughter had no issue figuring this out, and had the time of her life as her sister did all of the work. Size is great for their ages, but I’m not sure I can picture older kids on this. Perfect size; extremely lightweight so I can easily put it out of sight. The only downfall is that it’s a little slippery, so they both slid right off a few times.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works Well For My 2 Year Old Twins
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this "Rocky Crocky" as a Christmas gift for my twins. They can ride on it together or use it individually by riding in the middle. It fits them well at 2 years old and I can see them being able to use it for maybe another year before it gets too small. We haven't tried putting a third kid on this but I think it would be a tight squeeze with everyone jostling for space to hold on and put their feet. One thing I don't like about this is that because its so light weight it slides across the carpet when one kid is using it. It works well as an indoor and outdoor toy.
customer_reviews.author: Karate4566

customer_reviews.title: Good toy, holds up well
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my church nursery. The kids love it and I love that it can hold 3 kiddos and is very easily cleaned. The handles are somewhat rough feeling. Meaning they didn’t really round off or buff the edge of the “handles” the kids hold. So far it doesn’t seem to bother the kids but I may end up wrapping them in duck tape just to soften them a bit. Other than that it’s a great toy and holds up to about 15-40 kids a week using it :)
customer_reviews.author: SC Mommy

customer_reviews.title: Well designed
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy. I have 3 kids playing on this at one time. 8,3 and 1 year old and haven't had any issues. The rocking curve is gentle enough that small children don't flip, but my oldest daughter can still get it to rock well since she weighs more. The middle sit is perfect for smaller kids and they can even rock by themselves
customer_reviews.author: Jerrod Woodham

customer_reviews.title: Roc Croc Rocks!
customer_reviews.text: My 14 month old granddaughter loves this. At first she was a little uncertain to use it because at this point, her legs only went into the curve at the bottom and she was hesitated to get off it. Now she gets on and off easily and as her legs get longer, she will be able to anchor her legs on the floor as she mounts and dismounts.
customer_reviews.author: tennistoni

customer_reviews.title: My GRandkids love it.
customer_reviews.text: I bought the Croc for my grandkids for Christmas. Best investment I ever made. They love it and helps keep them occupied while their parents get other things done. Seems very sturdy and easy to clean mind you I have not seen it yet. Both children can be on it together or can ply on it alone. I would highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Margarete Sunderland-Oliva

customer_reviews.title: Fun and easy for indoor/outdoor!
customer_reviews.text: I had gotten this a gift and is as well as our friends loved it so much I bought one for them! Extremely easy to clean so we can have indoor or outdoor! Perfect for lots of kids of any ages we put the littlest in the middle. My daughter even sits in the middle to use alone!
customer_reviews.author: Stephani R.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: We got this as part of a backyard toddler park we made for our daughter. It's very sturdy and her older brothers play with her on it all the time. Shes only 1 and can use it on her own also. Worth the money for sure. Solid plastic, one piece. Fast shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Tonya W

customer_reviews.title: Toy in the box
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a Christmas gift for my grandchildren did not open the box until late Christmas Eve when we open the box it was empty we had a good laugh and fortunately my grandchildren have more than enough presents but to say the least they're present was a bust
customer_reviews.author: Karen LaMoure

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This adorable rocker was perfect for my children growing up and now I have one for my preschool! It is perfect for three children so more than only two get to ride. Feet are safe on the holding spot and no one gets their toes ran over!
customer_reviews.author: MT blackpearl

customer_reviews.title: wonderful toy
customer_reviews.text: I have two granddaughters, aged about 2 and 4, and they love this little crocodile rocker. It is well-made and easily holds both of them. It is the perfect size for both kids, and even their little friend. It can hold three small children, but I think it is best as a see-saw for two. The design is so cute and it was a great gift from Mimi. It has a little "lip" on the seat so no one falls off. Very sturdy material, would recommend to anyone looking for inexpensive playground equipment.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun!
customer_reviews.text: This is a cute, fun little rocker for indoor or outdoor. It can fit up to 3 littles at the same time. My 2 year old can drag it around herself. Lightweight, but decent quality.
customer_reviews.author: SH

customer_reviews.title: Lot of fun
customer_reviews.text: My 3 yr old granddaughter loves playing on it with her friends and her mommy. Perfect size for our back yard.
customer_reviews.author: hrv

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT OUTSIDE or INDOOR Kids Toy
customer_reviews.text: This was such a perfect gift for grandkids. It's sturdy and a good value for the price. The neighbors kids play with grandkids and it's a good addition for outside play! I have a huge living room so I keep it indoor, so both outdoor or indoor use is great! We love it and the kids do more!
customer_reviews.author: Dennise

customer_reviews.title: Nice for 3 children... good inside or outside
customer_reviews.text: Overall this was a good buy. My children played with it a lot when I kept it on our deck. Since buying a new house with a basement it doesn’t get used as much as now it is indoors. It is nice that my three-year-old can ride it by herself or with one one of her brothers and all three can get on it together if they like. It looks nice inside or outside. I’ve had it about 6 months now.
customer_reviews.author: Kalisa

customer_reviews.title: kids favorite Christmas toy
customer_reviews.text: My one-year-old and four-year-old absolutely love this. It's nice cause they can plan on it together or one can sit in the middle and play on it alone. I have a third little one that is not quite big enough to play on it yet but will be nice that he can sit in the middle while the two big ones sit on the end. They love this toy and is holding up well
customer_reviews.author: J Elliott

customer_reviews.title: NOT heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: This is really a cheap product. I was expecting it to be a little more heavy duty. I give it a week before my very tiny 2 year old daughter and average 3 year old daycare kiddo crack it.
customer_reviews.author: Kelley Blair Ostermann

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Ita cute, but for the price thought it would be a thicker plastic , like lil tikes products. Let's see how long it holds up with toddlers
customer_reviews.author: Stacey L Grant

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Child
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old has sensory issues. This is a great tool for him when he needs to rock. We have a spot where we can keep it inside.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Holt

customer_reviews.title: Good Old Fashioned  Fun
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 2 grandsons. The sturdiness and the fun that they have playing with it is priceless. Watching them makes me think of my childhood days.
customer_reviews.author: Drc

customer_reviews.title: All the kids love to play with it together and the best part ...
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my nephew's second birthday and it was such a hit! All the kids love to play with it together and the best part is its versatility. This can either be brought along for a play date at the park, or be used indoors on carpet while home.
customer_reviews.author: YeroC

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: My 3 kids love it. They are 5, 3 & 1
customer_reviews.author: makayla davis

customer_reviews.title: My child loves it, however...
customer_reviews.text: This is great for the kids but mine didn’t come with the alligator face on it. It’s just all the way green and no decal or anything. Doesn’t effect the product and we’ve gotten a lot of use from it but it’s not the same as pictured
customer_reviews.author: Brittany n Higgins

customer_reviews.title: So much fun for toddlers 18 months to 3 years old
customer_reviews.text: My Montessori Toddlers love it! It’s so much fun to have three toddlers using it.
customer_reviews.author: bubbles

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my 1 and 3 year old
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my 1 and 3 year old. My one year old goes in the middle and rocks herself back and forth and my 3 year old is in love with it. Great for outdoor use as well as inside use in the cold weather months. Can be used as a seesaw or I also pull them around the house on it!
customer_reviews.author: Amy P.

customer_reviews.title: Fun toy!
customer_reviews.text: Great toy! It’s perfect for 1-3 kiddos, and they have a lot of fun on it
customer_reviews.author: Crazsquaw

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t have to be an alligator
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy plastic. I love that my twins can play together, or just one can sit in the middle and rock alone. Stickers are optional, which I liked because I found the alligator face kind of “cheesy”. There are no traces of the alligator face molded into the plastic itself, so you’d never know the stickers are missing.
customer_reviews.author: JL

customer_reviews.title: Fun but no crocodile
customer_reviews.text: Fun for kiddos, but did not have crocodile face. Just green. They love it, just curious why it did not have crocodile face.
customer_reviews.author: amhoff

customer_reviews.title: Cute teeter totter.
customer_reviews.text: Three grandsons surely enjoyed this. It’s good for two Or three.
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: Sharp
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son for Christmas and I'm glad I ordered it with enough time to return it and purchase a different one. I opened it and pulled it by the handles to get it out of the box and immediately noticed that under the handles the plastic is sharp. The squares that you would hold with your hands is very uncomfortable just being squared in shape but it's even worse when the plastic at the underside of it isn't finished and has rough edges. This is not well thought out. I returned it and purchased the blue whale that has yellow plastic round finished handles to spare my kids' fingers and hands!
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Good for 1 or 2 children at a time.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my grandchildren. PERFECT!! My 4yr old and 2 yr old can both be on it at the same time, or just one at a time can sit in the center section. They both love it!
customer_reviews.author: Mesa Girl

customer_reviews.title: Worthy gift for 3to 5 years olds
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in big package safely and my kid loves it already, as to me this can be used for couples of years to come also
customer_reviews.author: scrajesh

customer_reviews.title: Wouldnt recommend
customer_reviews.text: Very unhappy. Bought 2 for little girls birthdays. Very cheaply made. Bows under tiniest weight. Would not recommend. Children weighed under 30lbs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift for Twins or multiple Children
customer_reviews.text: Gave this as a gift for two year old twins with an older sister. They all can ride! Looks cute and durable. Gift was well received.
customer_reviews.author: Met123

customer_reviews.title: Great for twins!
customer_reviews.text: My twin nephews age one and a half enjoyed this so much together!
customer_reviews.author: Patt Norling

customer_reviews.title: A great seesaw for the grandchildren
customer_reviews.text: The twins love it. They are constantly on it. I can use inside or outside.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Quite sturdy. 1-3 kids could easily play on it
customer_reviews.text: Quite sturdy. 1-3 kids could easily play on it. One kid could sit in the center and play like a rocky horse, two can play as advertise or have another friend sit in the middle as well. Kid friendly corners and Quite light to carry around.
customer_reviews.author: Jane Seech

customer_reviews.title: No decals...
customer_reviews.text: It looks cute, but there were no decals with mine, so it is just a big green plastic rocker with no crocodile teeth or eyes. That was one of the cute things about this item. I'm sure it will still be a good toy, just very disappointed it looks so plain now. Update: I just talked with Amazon customer service and they were very helpful in getting a new rocker with free one day shipping, and a shipping label to send this one back. Thank you, Amazon! Your customer service rocks!
customer_reviews.author: C. Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Thick plastic but still lightweight, it’s a hot with the kiddos
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: You guys, this is NOT worth $55. If ...
customer_reviews.text: You guys, this is NOT worth $55. If I had seen it at a store, I would have expected to see $5 on the price tag. It is smaller than I thought, lightweight plastic with sharp, unrefined edges. It was returned.
customer_reviews.author: Susie H.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Kept the kids outdoors with this :) Eventhough I can use this indoors too
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Simplicity
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing, such a simple design, easy for the kids to use and the seat in the middle makes it great not only for a 3rd child, but also when only one child wants to use it. One of my daughters uses it like a rocking horse when her sister is off playing elsewhere. Definitely a good buy... P.s...drill a drain hole or two in the bottom of the foot wells to keep the rain water from building up.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Ferruzzi

customer_reviews.title: This Croc Rocks !!!
customer_reviews.text: This toy is hard to find in stores, I guess because of its size. A great toy for 1, 2, or 3 kids to share -- good for learning about balance, where to sit so that the croc will rock, sharing, and just general fun ! Our granddaughter is 3 and plays on it all the time. Easy to stand up in a corner of the closet when not needed, but this toy is always needed! Very good quality and I expect it to last through a few more grandchildren (someday).
customer_reviews.author: bunco2778

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as seen in photo
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice addition to any toy room. I didnt love the stickers i had to put on but over all my kids enjoy this.
customer_reviews.author: KLee

customer_reviews.title: like playing with it and it seems sturdy enough
customer_reviews.text: It arrived with Amazon bar code stickers all over it that were a pain to get off. The unfinished edges along the bottom and under the handles are a bit rough. Not necessarily dangerous but it's uncomfortably "jagged" when I wrapped my fingers around any edge. Kids, 3 and 1, like playing with it and it seems sturdy enough.
customer_reviews.author: MP6

customer_reviews.title: Hollow plastic
customer_reviews.text: This is a cheap plastic version of the old school Little Tikes Seesaw @1990 (which my children grew up with and I can’t find). I donated the original to a preschool and it is STILL being used outside! This one won’t last outside in the weather...
customer_reviews.author: munsonra

customer_reviews.title: It was a hit!
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas gift for my twin grandsons. They loved it! It was a little lightweight but it was easy to move & use. Seems to still be in great shape. Can be used with one or two kids ( or three)! It was a hit!
customer_reviews.author: Bob W.

customer_reviews.title: Very cool gets lots of use
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this thing an i like the spot in the middle so he can use it alone
customer_reviews.author: Hoffmann

customer_reviews.title: Good Idea Bad Product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for the kids ages 1 and 5. It cracked and broke within a month of use. I believe the design is flawed because it is a piece of thin bent plastic and the nose of the crocodile holds it together. Which is the part that was strained and cracked. I like the animal concept, the handles and that two children or a single child can use it.
customer_reviews.author: Maria E. Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: A great toy for more than one child 🤔
customer_reviews.text: My preschoolers love this toy, it encourages sharing, playing together and working together
customer_reviews.author: Stacy Williams

customer_reviews.title: Grandkids and cousins really like this. A child can sit in the middle ...
customer_reviews.text: Grandkids and cousins really like this. A child can sit in the middle to rock by themselves and they use it both ways. They are ages 2 to 4. It's easy for them to get on and to rock
customer_reviews.author: Andertex119

customer_reviews.title: It has bought me time away from toddlers which is worth way more than whatever I paid
customer_reviews.text: the title says it all. My ids love it. My 18 mo will rock by himself for like 5 minutes. It paid for itself the 3rd time I got to send and email in peace and quiet. My daughter is 4 and they both love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great toy!
customer_reviews.text: Oh my gosh, my girls LOVES their crocodile. They are 2 and 4 and play together quite well as a teeter totter. They can also sit in the middle and rock solo when sister is busy doing something else. Definitely would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: J. Leach

customer_reviews.title: The only toy my kids happily share
customer_reviews.text: Cute and perfect for my one-year-old and three-year-old! This is the only toy that they happily share. My kids play forever with this thing. And, hey, much cheaper than a baby sitter 😉
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Basic, sturdy and can be used by 1 or more kids
customer_reviews.text: My toddler enjoys this rocker but it's more of a "see it, rock for a few minutes, then move on" kind of toy. I like that one kid can use it by themselves. One issue, the underside of the handles are hollow with somewhat sharp edges. I spent a few minutes with a file to smooth the edges to avoid cuts on hands or fingers and have had no problems or injuries.
customer_reviews.author: SpoiledKidsDad

customer_reviews.title: Great for outdoor or indoor
customer_reviews.text: We got this for indoor use and the kids (1 and 4 years old) really enjoy it. You can ride it with 1, 2 or 3 kids and it is pretty stable and appears to be well made and durable. Kids also figured out additional games such as putting little cars in the groove and rocking it back and worth so the cars go up and down.
customer_reviews.author: A. Lerman

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: It arrived when it expected and seems very sturdy. I like that there is place for the feet to go on rather than on the side of the floor so there is less risk of the feet getting caught underneath and crushing the little toes during rocking. My 2 and 4 year old love it. great toy.
customer_reviews.author: ParentBuyer in SF

customer_reviews.title: Fun toy
customer_reviews.text: We actually use this in our playroom indoors. While I can see a young child pulling the stickers off of their faces, the crocodile is cute and feels durable. The plastic is, however, thinner than you would find in a little tikes or step 2 toy. This is also nice because you can have 1 child or 3 smaller ones playing on it at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: Southerngirl

customer_reviews.title: Tiny croc much to small!
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice toy if you are looking for your 18 month old to use it. It looked much bigger in the picture. We have a daycare and no one over two can even fit on it so it looks like if you purchase this please only expect to use it for about 6 months not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: The Dude

customer_reviews.title: 3 Young Boys can Fit!
customer_reviews.text: I have 3 young boys and they love this little seesaw. It is not overly large but it is the perfect size for my 4, 2 and 2 year olds.. And they can all go on at the same time which is a bonus!
customer_reviews.author: Tara

customer_reviews.title: Great Indoor/Outdoor Toy
customer_reviews.text: I love this rocker! The Crocodile Rocker is all season: it facilitates physical indoor play during winter and smoothly transitions to outdoor play in warmer weather. It is substantial, durable, and easy to clean. The manufacturer's recommended age for use is 18 months to 4 years. However, my 10 month old was able to hold the handle, sit comfortably, and rock with adult supervision.
customer_reviews.author: Island Girl

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my great niece and she loves it. The reason I wanted this particular one is that a child can sit in the middle and use the rocker/seesaw all by herself or she can use it with a friend. My great niece is just shy of 3 years old and this was a perfect gift.
customer_reviews.author: JLinhart

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun
customer_reviews.text: This is a sturdy rocker and can hold a lot of weight, as my 14 and 15 year old daughters thought it would be funny to get on it and rock! I bought it for my 1 & a half year old daughter and she loves it as well as a 4 year old friend of the family. When she is rocking on it alone she sits in the middle part of it.
customer_reviews.author: Parkskdm

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Fun for one or multiple children at a time. Safe for little ones yet fun for 3 yr olds. Pretty sturdy
customer_reviews.author: Vickie Stemper

customer_reviews.title: My almost two year old loved it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughters upcoming second birthday and she loves it. She played with her two year old cousin on it who is 10 lbs heavier than her and fell off when the other child got up but since she was close to the ground she didn't get hurt. My 10 year old niece was playing with it too. So i HAVE A FEELING THIS THING WILL BE AROUND FOR a while.
customer_reviews.author: tasha still

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Its adorable! No complaints! Bought this for my sensory seeking autistic toddler and he loves it!
customer_reviews.author: kourtney

customer_reviews.title: Grandchildren love this.
customer_reviews.text: A timeless toy for the grandchildren. Lots of fun on it for them. It is sturdy and of good quality made.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Naes

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The kids loved it and i love its light and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: eve

customer_reviews.title: My daughter love it with her cousins
customer_reviews.text: Our daughter loves using this rocker and more when you close cousins ​​or other children to play with. It is a good product for children and secure with clear supervision best teach them to the children with just a toy to play together and work together. We recommend this product plus is easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: YBBBM

customer_reviews.title: Entertainment for the grandkids
customer_reviews.text: My 3 grandkids love it and can all ride at once. Ages 4, 3 and 2
customer_reviews.author: Sandy B

customer_reviews.title: they love it.
customer_reviews.text: Was a Christmas gift for my granddaughters ages 2 & 4...they love it..iis great...they can play together or separate...
customer_reviews.author: Mary Henson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: love it..well, my granddaughter does...very well made and balanced...she can "rock out" from it and it stays safe
customer_reviews.author: mincer

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: My boys love it, it’s easy to clean. It doesn’t warp in the sun. Good overall.
customer_reviews.author: Lena

customer_reviews.title: Great toy
customer_reviews.text: My boys love this seesaw. They are 4 years old and 1 1/2 years old and smile every time they are on this crocodile. I just wish that I didnt have to pay as much as I did.
customer_reviews.author: Macek

customer_reviews.title: Crocodile rocker
customer_reviews.text: Our 27 month old granddaughter loves this rocker. The side floor panels are a bit too narrow and her tiny little feet get stuck sometimes. Overall, I would recommend this product. The price was affordable and the plastic material is durable; should last a long time. I rate this item 5 stars
customer_reviews.author: lesley1234

customer_reviews.title: This is a very cute and sturdy rockers for small children
customer_reviews.text: This is a very cute and sturdy rockers for small children. It was smaller than I had expected but for small children it is sufficient.
customer_reviews.author: Henry

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Don't bother unless you have two kids at least three. If my husband hadn't thrown out the box I'd return it. The grips are too small to hang on to and my grandson slips off the slick plastic. It slips on the carpet Need I say more?
customer_reviews.author: Katka

customer_reviews.title: This is a great see-saw. My 18 month old daughter loves to ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great see-saw. My 18 month old daughter loves to see-saw. She can ride herself or with her big sis. She still needs a bit of help getting on/off. Seems pretty well built to, especially for thin molded plastic! Overall though, we are very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Detroit mom

customer_reviews.title: Cheap plastic but my kids LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: Cheap plastic but my kids LOVE IT!! age 3 35lbs and 1 and half 25lbs and they balance just fine
customer_reviews.author: Edward A.

customer_reviews.title: NOT THAT IMPRESSED FOR THE MONEY I PAID. BOUGHT ...
customer_reviews.text: NOT THAT IMPRESSED FOR THE MONEY I PAID. BOUGHT THIS FOR MY GRAND DAUGHTERS AND ITS A LITTLE CHEAPLY MADE. SPEND THE EXTRA AND GET A HEAVIER DUTY ONE.
customer_reviews.author: R S Brudz

customer_reviews.title: Been loved for years
customer_reviews.text: I bought this when my kids were 3 and 1. Now they are 7 and 5 and maybe outgrowing it. But it was great inside and outside. Can have 1,2 or 3 kids on at a time. It still looks good after all the use. Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Super cute, and super fun
customer_reviews.text: Super cute, and super fun! One child in the center, and it is a great rocker. One at each end, and it's a great teeter-totter. Works great outside or inside!
customer_reviews.author: Tracey S.

customer_reviews.title: Bought this for my 2 year old son. His ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 2 year old son. His 5 year old sister enjoys playing with him on it. I can even fit on it although it's hard you see my legs to rock it.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: My kids LOVE the crocodile
customer_reviews.text: My kids LOVE the crocodile! Also, I think it's generally much safer than most of the other products out there due to its length.
customer_reviews.author: Dillyss

customer_reviews.title: Fun, cute, and good for play dates
customer_reviews.text: We use this a lot when we have my daughter's play dates over. It is not too large, and it is so cute! I give 4 stars because it was little tricky to put the face stickers on. And the handles had some sharp edges that I needed to shave off.
customer_reviews.author: V.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for toddlers. 1-3 kids and works well with any number too.
customer_reviews.author: Breigh Schlepp

customer_reviews.title: Not much fun for kids over 2 1/2 or so
customer_reviews.text: The concept is great but this little item is really too small to provide any amount of excitement for kids much older than 2 1/2 or so. We have a 2 year old and 5 year old and they really don't play with it much at all - sad because it wasn't cheap.
customer_reviews.author: DEBORAH S.

customer_reviews.title: Grandkids love it
customer_reviews.text: Grandkids love it. I love the fact that it did not have to be put together, can easily be moved from room to room or from inside to outside and up to 3 of them can be on it at once :-)
customer_reviews.author: TLChief

customer_reviews.title: Great for both my girls to play together but on ...
customer_reviews.text: Great for both my girls to play together but on their own too. They sometimes fight because one doesn't want to get on the other side so I remind them, they can use the middle and problem solved.
customer_reviews.author: F.V.

customer_reviews.title: Great toy. Need more stickers.
customer_reviews.text: Love it but accidentally threw away the stickers. Anyway to get more?
customer_reviews.author: mary Rivera

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend
customer_reviews.text: The kids took to it right away. Probably best for smaller children though. Arrived on time and as pictured. Have only used for one day but so far would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Mira

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for one or two
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for little ones. My 18 mo twins have a blast. There's no danger of it rocking over although it is very light weight. And the seat in the middle allows for one child to play.
customer_reviews.author: Mazy

customer_reviews.title: Twin win
customer_reviews.text: Twin 18 month old grandsons were cautious at first (this did not look like rocking horse they were used to), but after their stuffed pandas rode it, they were okay. Handles have sharp edges which were filed smooth by dad. Toe well a little narrow, but boys figured out better foot placement. They use it as musical instrument, push toy, car track, etc as well as rocker. Also, parents grateful there is no incessant cloying song (like many toys have), wipes clean easily, and one or both kids can play at same time.
customer_reviews.author: Debi G

customer_reviews.title: Great toy
customer_reviews.text: My twin 2-yr-old girls love the rocking horse at church, so I knew they would love this since they could ride alone or with each other. Very sturdy, but lightweight enough to move around. Lots of fun!
customer_reviews.author: GinaN

customer_reviews.title: Best Indoor Fun for Young Grandchildren
customer_reviews.text: My grandsons, aged 6 & 4, have a blast riding this together and by themselves. Because of the smooth bottom on this rocker they are able to ride it across the living room in small increments when riding by themselves and it gives them a workout. Haven't used it outside yet but it is good exercise when they have to remain indoors.
customer_reviews.author: R S

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my two-year-old grand daughter. It's perfect for her. A really excellent, sturdy toy which can be rocked on alone or rocked on my two. And actually, we've had three on it, with her brothers on each end and her in the middle!1 No complaints at all. Delivery was great as well.
customer_reviews.author: Florence Ponk

product_meta.title: Original Toy Company Dantoy Crocodile Rocker
product_meta.description:
Perfect for every darda newcomer. The set includes two loops and a porsche boxster. The Roadway Length is 3, 00 m. Assemble your own Roadway with this set - there are a lot of possibilities.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
This rocking Crocodile will provide hours of play an can even accommodate 3 children. Get ready for a stream of giggles. The Crocodile Rocker is designed for safety and stability. It is very durable and has outstanding play value, that will provide years of rocking fun. Use of top grade raw materials by Dantoy of Denmark, ensures a consistency of quality and color. This 3 child rocker can handle up to 150 pounds total weight. No assembly required and is suitable indoors or out. Dantoy maintains the highest standards in quality and construction and their products have been PVC free and Phthalate free for years. Made in Denmark by some of the happiest people on Earth.
